Description: Fragment of oval handle to sharpish turn of a Rhodian pottery transport amphora. Clay fine pink-buff; cream slip. Circular stamp with rose and piloi symbols.
Curator's comments: Name Zenon. Probably from same die as BM 1874,0805.24. From same die as Alexandria, Greco-Roman Museum, ABC 0363.05.
Bibliographic references: Stoddart 1847 / Memoir on the inscribed pottery of Rhodes, Cnidus and other Greek Cities (283)
